actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.
House Committee on Public Works and Transportation Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1001.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the Peninsula Airport Commission, Virginia, for airport purposes.

summary.text: Delineates the conditions under which the Secretary of Transportation is authorized to grant releases from any restriction contained in a deed whereby the United States conveyed certain property in Newport News and York County, Virginia, to the Peninsula Airport Commission for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the Peninsula Airport Commission, Virginia, for airport purposes.
